casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tae Kwon HAMMONDS. No. 389A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 27, 2016. Joseph E. Elder, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hammonds, Tae Kwon. John R. Rittelmeyer, Raleigh, Anne Bleyman, for Disability Rights North Carolina, et al. Trey Robison, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*92The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of April 2016 by Defendant to File Amended Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of April 2016."
